column5: U2 Concert >> >>  Bono is at a U2 concert in Halifax , Nova Scotia , when he asks the >> audience for some quiet. >> >>Then, in the silence, he starts to slowly clap his hands.  He says into >>the microphone, in a deep solemn voice... >> >>"Just for a moment, think outside yourself...Outside this arena. >> >>Every time I clap my hands, a child in Africa dies." >> >>A loud Newfy voice from near the front pierces the >>moment...  "Well,Lard tunderin jasus, ya stupid arse, stop yer fockin' >>clappin' then!" >>
Probably the exact words from every member in the audience. I was thinking the same thing, but without the eastcoast accent.
That is a genuine hoot, still laughing, and believe me I needed a good laugh
